about_the_game:
The Rainbringer's Extras is a free expansion for On Your Hands containing Old Builds, Models, Unused Assets, and more!

Featuring:

  • "Alpha and Beta Builds" - Several old builds for On Your Hands across its various stages of development.
  • "Character Models and Textures" - Fully rigged and textured assets for all of the monsters and characters in On Your Hands.
  • "Development Documents and Assets" - Various written documents used during the course of On Your Hands' development.
  • "Fonts" - The two hand drawn fonts for On Your Hands, used for human and alien text.
  • "Unused Assets" - Various pieces of cut content for On Your Hands, including a cut enemy and unused lore.
  • "Welcome To Ooblterra Music" - Extra musical tracks not part of On Your Hands' soundtrack.

After installing, it can be found on disk by navigating to the game's Installed Files section.
detailed_description:
The Rainbringer's Extras is a free expansion for On Your Hands containing Old Builds, Models, Unused Assets, and more!

Featuring:

  • "Alpha and Beta Builds" - Several old builds for On Your Hands across its various stages of development.
  • "Character Models and Textures" - Fully rigged and textured assets for all of the monsters and characters in On Your Hands.
  • "Development Documents and Assets" - Various written documents used during the course of On Your Hands' development.
  • "Fonts" - The two hand drawn fonts for On Your Hands, used for human and alien text.
  • "Unused Assets" - Various pieces of cut content for On Your Hands, including a cut enemy and unused lore.
  • "Welcome To Ooblterra Music" - Extra musical tracks not part of On Your Hands' soundtrack.

After installing, it can be found on disk by navigating to the game's Installed Files section.
name: On Your Hands - Rainbringer's Extras
short_description: A pack of development assets for On Your Hands.
